meanings.definition: To cut (something) into pieces or shapes
meanings.sent1: She carves the pumpkin into a spooky face for Halloween.
meanings.sent2: He carves the wood to make a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The chef carves the watermelon into a funny animal shape.
meanings.sent4: The artist carves emotions into his stone masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Grandpa carves the turkey with precision and skill.

meanings.definition: To create or produce (something) by cutting
meanings.sent1: The skilled craftsman carves intricate designs on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: She carves her name on the tree trunk with a pocket knife.
meanings.sent3: The barber carves unique patterns on his customers' hair.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor carves a story out of the marble block.
meanings.sent5: The chef carves a beautiful swan out of the ice block.

meanings.definition: To make or create (something) by shaping or cutting a material
meanings.sent1: The artist carves a beautiful vase out of the clay.
meanings.sent2: He carves a path through the dense forest with a machete.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter carves intricate details on the wooden furniture.
meanings.sent4: She carves a path through the snow-covered mountain.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor carves a stunning statue out of the marble.
